lead_paragraph: The Academy of Television Arts and Sciences honored “Swear Jar,” a commercial for Bud Light beer that has never appeared on television, with the Emmy Award for outstanding commercial at the 60th Creative Arts Emmy Awards. The spot was introduced online and has been watched millions of times on Web sites like bud.tv. The commercial was created for Anheuser-Busch, the brewer of Bud Light, by the Chicago office of DDB Worldwide, part of the Omnicom Group. It was the fourth nomination for a commercial Emmy for Anheuser-Busch in five years and the company’s first win.
